title.rendered: Regent College London welcomes first set of international students for EDSML

content.rendered:
Regent College London welcomed our first cohort of international students who are starting to pursue their Level 7 Extended Diploma in Strategic Management and Leadership (EDSML). Our students are coming from all over the world: Bangladesh, Pakistan, India, Nepal and more.
Their induction took place on 11th May, 2015 at our campus in Wembley. Students met key members of staff, learned about our policies and the course they were about to take, then received their all-important handbooks and student ID cards.
